Can I get some ice cream?
ice cream is good, but this is tasty, too.
I guess we can try it.
You thought you could get away with stealing my wallet, you little shit?
You are worth about as much as a sewer cockroach's dick.
you thought you could steal my wallet with
the same fingers that wipe your filthy ass...
I cannot let you get away with that, can I?
And he is using such filthy language...
Did not you hear me tell you to stop?!
You did not have to push me like that.
That guy tried to steal my wallet, which makes him a very bad person.
Of course I should punish him.
The look in your eyes is awfully hard, Jotaro.
planning to part ways with me just because
The characters, groups, places, laws, and names used in this program have no connection to any existing in real life.
I hurt that thief a little, could you?
There are four of them up there.
do not think so hard about this.
I am just a bit annoyed today.
The trip's exhausted me and left me in a bad mood.
You are in a bad mood?
Seemed to me you felt pretty good.
The old man and Avdol think it is a good idea to head to India by train.
We are taking a cable car to Singapore Station to reserve tickets.
I guess you like coconut juice a lot, huh, Mr. Kakyoin?
I must have seen it wrong.
It must have been a fiber from the coconut or something.
Are you going to eat that cherry?
If you are not going to eat it, give it to me.
I-It is like Kakyoin-san's a totally different person!
What are you glaring at with that stupid look on your face,
I told you to get on.
Here, I have got a ticket for you.
Take it and get yourself lost,
now that you have been possessed!
Have not you realized that my body's been getting bigger?
But I was able to touch him just now...
Is there a Stand that I can actually hit?
I combine with any flesh that I consume.
So I am a Stand that normal people can see and even touch.
I am Yellow Temperance, of the Temperance card.
This is my true, handsome face!
Take a look at your hand.
There is a little bit of me there from when you hit me.
If you touch that, it will go after your left hand, too.
Go ahead and pick your nose with that left hand!
This is a Stand that devours things slowly...
The more it eats, the bigger it gets.
You will never get it off!
While I am digesting you, I will be sure to stuff your mouth with your own shit!
But Mr. Kakyoin was not actually Mr. Kakyoin!
Jojo's in the cable car and there is
this weird slime eating his finger and we are in a lot of trouble!
The cable car station near the trade center!
Hurry and come back to the hotel
Jojo left me behind, so I was sunbathing by the pool.
Which means, Anne, your Kakyoin is...
Jojo just jumped out of the cable car!
A Stand that combines with flesh?
I need to do something about this Stand.
If worse comes to worst, I might have to chop off my finger.
Do you really think you got away?
Well, I guess I would better tell you.
Get a straw, suck out all the gunk in your ears, and listen up.
My Stand, Yellow Temperance, has no weaknesses.
It is not that you ran away.
It is just that I do not have to chase you,
It will burn me, too, but I guess I will burn it to death.
Heating it is a bad idea...
Let Me see your ice pop for a sec.
What are you doing to that boy's ice pop?
Then shut up and enjoy the scenery.
When we get to the ground, I will buy you a new one.
N-Now it is forming needles and digging deeper into my hand!
Fire and ice will not work at all.
It does not have a weakness.
You were already in this cable car?
I am here to finish you off...
Like I keep telling you, I do not have any weaknesses!
Are you even listening to me?
My Stand is essentially an armor that consumes power.
No matter how fast you may be, no matter how strong you may be,
it is absolutely useless before Yellow Temperance!
You cannot even run, unless you cut off your right hand!
You have no way of winning!
This thing really does not have a weakness.
It could be the most powerful thing ever.
The Joestar family has its own philosophy
You are in the middle of being eaten, you ass!
My Stand's got a hold of you that you cannot escape, and you say you will run?
But I am running into the water.
You opened your Stand's guard so you could breathe.
No matter how invincible that Stand may be,
if I defeat the user, the Stand will die, too.
You sure said all the crap you wanted to back there.
I am the type that takes such things to heart.
They are going to have to wire my jaw, too.
I do not plan to risk my life going after you people.
Tell me about the Stand users that are planning to attack us.
Th-That is the one thing I cannot say.
I cannot rat out my own side...
Death, The Empress, The Hanged Man,
and The Emperor are the four that will come after you!
Stand users do not show others their powers,
because it would expose their weaknesses.
B-But there is some witch who told Dio about Stands...
And her son is among the four.
He is a man with two right hands.
His card is The Hanged Man.
He is the one that killed Polnareff's sister, is not he?
I have heard a rumor about his powers...
I have not actually seen it,
but Polnareff has no chance of winning.
But it looks like the goddess of fortune is still on my side.
There are a lot of crayfish around it.
is connected to the manhole that is near me!
I am going to pull you in and hold you there!
Looks like what I told you
about the man with two right hands will go to waste.
To think there was a hole so close that I could pull you into...
I even ate some crayfish and powered up.
If I kill you, Dio will give me a hundred million dollars.
To think I can make that much from a few minutes of fighting.
Do not you think I am pretty lucky?
It is rather hard to observe yourself.
Have not you realized you were only lucky up until now?
Before, you only suffered a broken nose.
That was when you were truly lucky!
A water pressure punch... f-from inside the drain?!
I-I was just kidding, Mr. Jotaro!
I was just messing with ya!
I did not mean anything by it.
Y-You are not thinking of hitting me any more, are you?
I am a seriously injured man...
My nose is broken and my jaw's going to have to be wired shut...
I have nothing more to say to you.
So we are finally heading to India.
So the man with two right hands is called Centerfold...
By the way, where is Anne?
up until the time the train departed, but...
I am sure that the time for her to meet her father had arrived,
so she went to see him.
I cannot help but think that the brat was lying about
Well, it is a bit lonely without her around, is not it, Jojo?
A Stand that perfectly disguised itself as me.
Apparently, it had already transformed when we left the hotel.
Jojo, are you going to eat that cherry?
I do not mean to be greedy, but they are my favorite.
If you do not give me a tip, you will not go to heaven, Mister.
Do not put your nose on it!
The Emperor and The Hanged Man, Part 1
Is not it a great country?
